mapper.select: SELECT c.crewNo, c.geoCode, c.categoryBigNo, c.categorySmallNo, crewName, crewIntro, crewContent, crewMax, crewAttend, crewStatus, crewOriginalImg, crewSaveImg, crewOriginalBanner, crewSaveBanner, crewDeadDate, c.createdAt, updatedAt, geoCity, geoDistrict, categoryBigName, categorySmallName FROM crew c LEFT JOIN geo g ON c.geoCode = g.geoCode LEFT JOIN category_big cb ON c.categoryBigNo = cb.categoryBigNo LEFT JOIN category_small cs ON c.categorySmallNo = cs.categorySmallNo

SELECT c.crewNo, c.geoCode, c.categoryBigNo, c.categorySmallNo, crewName, crewIntro, crewContent, crewMax, crewAttend, crewStatus, crewOriginalImg, crewSaveImg, crewOriginalBanner, crewSaveBanner, crewDeadDate, c.createdAt, updatedAt, geoCity, geoDistrict, categoryBigName, categorySmallName FROM crew c LEFT JOIN geo g ON c.geoCode = g.geoCode LEFT JOIN category_big cb ON c.categoryBigNo = cb.categoryBigNo LEFT JOIN category_small cs ON c.categorySmallNo = cs.categorySmallNo WHERE c.categoryBigNo = #{ctg}
SELECT categoryBigNo, categoryBigName, categoryBigIcon, createdAt FROM category_big
SELECT categorySmallNo, categoryBigNo, categorySmallName, createdAt FROM category_small
SELECT geoCode, geoCity, geoDistrict FROM geo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew (geoCode, categoryBigNo, categorySmallNo, memberNo, crewName, crewContent, crewIntro, crewMax, crewOriginalImg, crewSaveImg, crewOriginalBanner, crewSaveBanner) VALUES(#{geoCode}, #{categoryBigNo}, #{categorySmallNo}, #{memberNo}, #{crewName}, #{crewContent}, #{crewIntro}, #{crewMax}, #{crewOriginalImg}, #{crewSaveImg}, #{crewOriginalBanner}, #{crewSaveBanner})
